website_summaries.verdict: Vintage-look cooler that comes in bright 1950s colors like teal, lime and orange.
pros: Powder coated steel construction, this 80 quart cooler can sit in the sun with no noticeable fading
The insulated basin keeps drinks cold
The legs are removable to make it into a chest cooler
The trendy design can be personalized with stickers for a fun look

customer_reviews.title: it was well packed and looks better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to store gardening supplies on my patio. I was initially concerned that the cooler would arrive dented but, it was well packed and looks better than I thought it would. My husband assembled it for me and pointed out the high quality wheels with ball bearings. He describes the finish as similar to that of auto paint and actually waxed it before I took it outside. I can't testify as to how watertight it is. It does, however, appear to be well-made, and I don't see any obvious flaws in the construction. The cooler I received is a slightly darker orange than the one shown in the product photos but, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great bright color, easy to assemble, easy to drain, rolls, wheel locks are great. A must have for family and friend get togethers
customer_reviews.author: Reno mom

customer_reviews.title: Orange is the new black
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler! No problems putting it together. Was worried about shipping damage due to other reviews, but it came in totally fine! Nice addition to garage bar set up we have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally got to use it.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a while. But worked great for NYE!
customer_reviews.author: Marq

customer_reviews.title: Wheel locks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and great color and cooler, however the very day we got it the wheel locks broke off. They were very thin pieces of metal not the greatest quality but love it other than that
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: no seal and slides off easily. Does not hold ice for very long
customer_reviews.text: Side walls are very thin resulting in less insulation. The folding top just lays on there, no seal and slides off easily. Does not hold ice for very long. Never would have bought it if I had seen one in person first. Legs are not very sturdy. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: not as good as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: The first one came in dented which amazon easily and promptly handled. It does not have the embossed writing on it but since the color was good I thought that I would try it. It went together ok and rolls ok. The really bad part is that the hinge sticks and pops every time you open it to get a cold beverage. It is really annoying and kids have a hard time with it. So color is great but not embossed like picture
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Easy to assemble and looks good. Fit and finish are excellent. Packaging is very poor, basically just put inside a cardboadrd box. our first two were dented and damaged, but the third one was fine. Be sure to carefully inspect upon receipt, especially if the box is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: cooler
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to put together and received many complements on the design and use. I would recommend this item to thers
customer_reviews.author: orlando benzan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice! Orange is vibrant! I also ordered a cover for it. You have to put the legs, handles, bottle opener & cup that catches the caps on but it was a piece of cake!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4bruno_1

product_meta.title: Permasteel 80 Quart Portable Picnic Cooler in Orange
product_meta.description: This stylish 80 Quart powder coated patio party cooler cart will add a classic touch to any backyard or patio. It holds up to 110 – 12oz cans with plenty of room for ice. The insulated basin keeps drinks cool for up to 36 hours. The versatile design includes four heavy-duty casters for easy mobility, two locking for stability once in the desired area. Keep guests happy outside your home and drinks cool. The cooler features an easy to use cap remover. The additional shelf below adds space for more drinks and snacks. Dimensions: 34'' H x 35.5'' W x 19.25'' D. Color: Orange
feature_bullets: EASY ACCESS - Easy to open lids allows for quick drink access; Includes bottle opener and cap catcher on the side; Drain plug makes cleanup quick and easy.
STAY COLDER LONGER - Keeps drinks cool for up to 36 hours.
DURABILITY - Powder coated Steel construction; Rust resistant; Fade Resistant.
EASY MOVEMENT - Two side handles make for an easy move anywhere on the patio; Four casters and two of which are locking make it easy to position and lock in place.
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: 34'' H x 35.5'' W x 19.25'' D.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars12 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
